column20: Creates their own shots using dribbles, stepbacks, pull-ups. High pull-up volume, high unassisted FG%, high ISO %.
Creates shots for teammates. High AST%, high potential assists, high PnR ball-handler usage.
Attacks the rim with speed/athleticism. High drives per game, rim frequency, FTr (free throw rate).
Strong offense + strong defense. Balanced scoring + good defensive metrics (stocks, DFG%, DBPM).
Protects the paint. High block rate, low DFG% at rim, high contests, rim deterrence.
Generates steals, deflections, on-ball pressure. High STL%, high deflections.
High midrange volume + efficiency. Pull-up 2s, elbow jumpers, fadeaways.
High 3PA rate + accuracy. Catch-and-shoot threats, spacing gravity.
Efficient at the rim, midrange, and 3s. Versatile scoring chart.
A center who shoots from deep. High 3PA rate for a big; pops instead of rolls.
